text: Nza khueŋ suanga fhu, nza nduarira wari wo zɨri ndiv vun kuamkuav, nen ndikndigi gumgi mbui tɨvir muunga. Nza vhɨra khaŋ suanga fhu, nza mbui tɨvi, mbe mbui tɨvi fara muuŋgi. Zakɨra fhuvara! Mba gumgi, mbe wari wo vuzvugira, mbe wari wo mbui tɨvi garav, nta nzuai. Mbe khaŋ mbui, mbe wari wo mbui tɨvi garav, nta nzuav wari phorga nzuai. Maaŋ mbui gumgi, mbe guigira ndɨkndɨgi vhuuiŋ ki fhuvara.
